verbose_text: Among all the 84 kinase inhibitors screened, a compound (Tyrphostin AG1478) led to significant bioluminescence activity increase compared with the vehicle control treatment (about 3.4-fold) comparable with the known Src specific Kinase inhibitors (PP1 and PP2, about 4.5-fold and 3.7-fold, respectively).
